Quest.QuestDescription: Dragons have been attacking people in the woods and are advancing towards the castle, can you help them out?

Task.TaskText: The castle guards can be found just beyond the castle bridge.

Conversation.Dialogue: Castle Guard: {CHARACTER_NAME}, We're so glad you're here. We've been pinned down by this army of Blood Elves but we've had reports that Dragon are approaching from the wasteland.
Castle Guard: We'll be screwed if we let them get much closer!
{CHARACTER_NAME}: Okay... calm down... you hold down the bridge and I'll see what I can do about those Dragons.
Castle Guard: Remember, Dragons are tough creatures... don't let them too close... Good Luck!

Task.TaskText: The wasteland can be found beyond the mud castle. The Dragons were last seen roaming that area. Once you have done this speak with a Guard to complete the quest.

Conversation.Dialogue: Castle Guard: {CHARACTER_NAME} your're alive! I never thought you'd make it. Have you dealt with the Dragons?
{CHARACTER_NAME}: If you never thought I would make it why did you send me to slay the dragons...
{CHARACTER_NAME}: Nevertheless the Dragons should be haulted for the time being. That is at least until they regroup and decide to attack again.
Castle Guard: Hopefully by then we will be ready to go on the offensive! Especially with your help.
